findings.title: Rounding error
findings.description: In Solidity, division before multiplication can cause rounding errors due to lack of floating points.

findings.title: Deposit and withdraw functions are not reentrancy protected
findings.description: The deposit and withdraw functions do not have reentrancy protection, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unimplemented Logic in distributePoolRewardsAdmin() Function
findings.description: The distributePoolRewardsAdmin() function has a comment indicating reward calculation logic, but the actual implementation is missing.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges when not renounced, including updating liquidity lock by user, changing txFee, withdrawing contract buTokens and native tokens, changing panaRate and buToken addresses, changing loopLimit, changing rewardPoolCaller, and running director's and global distributions.
